ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.126"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67508-2" AED use prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10171)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AEDUsePriorToEMSArrival 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.13 STATIC (CONF:10172)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.07

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:10173)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP"
This participant SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] participantRole (CONF:10174)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC (CONF:10175)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.08
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67508-2" AED use prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10171)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AEDUsePriorToEMSArrival 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.13 STATIC (CONF:10172)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.07

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:10173)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP"
This participant SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] participantRole (CONF:10174)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC (CONF:10175)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.08

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.126"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1506403594"/> <code code="67508-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="AED use prior to EMS arrival"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <participant typeCode="RESP"> <participantRole> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> </participantRole> </participant> </observation>
